🎉 We're excited to share that Prada Group has announced their first investment in sustainable aviation fuel credits using our GoGreen Plus service. Today, hashtag#SAF is one of the most effective ways to decarbonize the aviation industry, allowing for a reduction of greenhouse gas emissions by at least 80% compared to conventional aviation fuel. Teaming up with industry leaders like Prada Group, we're charting a course to decarbonization in the aviation industry. Let's pave the way for change together. 💚 hashtag#DHLGlobalForwarding hashtag#PradaGroup hashtag#Partnership hashtag#SustainableFuels hashtag#Aviation

We are closing now an exciting Season 9 of the FIA Formula E Championship! What an exhilarating journey to new iconic venues for a truly electrifying show! The logistics have been complex and at times challenging, but everything was perfectly delivered! But nothing would have been possible without the unsung heroes behind the scenes! They navigated the whole season with such an enthusiasm, always holding each other’s back, always with a smile on their face, always united as a working family. Together they made it seem so effortless, together they accomplished! They are the best, the epitome of the word TEAM. I will never thank them enough, both the Team on the ground and the one at home for all the hard work put into this with grace and love for what is not a job. It s a passion! I celebrate you with huge pride! hashtag#DhlMotorsports

DHL Global Forwarding Italy is pleased to announce that it has successfully completed the CEIV (Center of Excellence for Independent Validators) Lithium Battery Certification Program of the IATA (International Air Transport Association), becoming the first and only Italian freight forwarder to have obtained certification related to the safe handling and transportation of lithium batteries.
